text.config.nototempvp-config.option.tot: If totems should alow kills from selected entities.
Entities a Totem of Undying won't help against. Use "*" to make them ignore all entities.
text.config.nototempvp-config.option.ely: If elytras should get disabled upon taking damage.
text.config.nototempvp-config.option.dis: What damage sources should disable elytra flight for a period.
text.config.nototempvp-config.option.ely: For how many ticks the elytra should be disabled.
